hero.subtitle: We build AI assistants that speak Albanian, English, Italian & German. Apps that handle bookings, invoices, and customer support — so you don't have to.

services.title: Services
services.subtitle: AI assistants, document processors, and apps built for businesses in Albania and the Balkans — with multilingual support from day one.

ai.title: AI Assistants
ai.description: Chatbots that answer in Albanian, English, Italian, or German. Connected to WhatsApp, your website, or internal tools. They handle FAQs, bookings, and support tickets.

fullstack.title: Web & Mobile Apps
fullstack.description: Booking systems, dashboards, and internal tools. Fast on any device. We use React and React Native — the same tech as Airbnb and Instagram.

enterprise.title: Data & Automation
enterprise.description: Stop copying data between spreadsheets. We connect your systems, automate reports, and make sure you're compliant with EU regulations.

aiLab.title: AI in Action
aiLab.subtitle: Real examples of what we build. These aren't concepts — they're capabilities we've shipped for clients.

chatbot.title: Multilingual Chat
chatbot.description: A guest asks about room availability in German. The bot checks your calendar, responds in German, and can hand off to your team if needed.

extraction.title: Invoice Reading
extraction.description: Upload a PDF invoice. The AI extracts vendor, amount, date, and line items. Exports to your accounting software or spreadsheet.

automation.title: Task Automation
automation.description: New booking? Auto-send confirmation. Guest checked out? Request a review. Late payment? Send a reminder. All without lifting a finger.

portfolio.title: Portfolio
portfolio.subtitle: Projects we've built for hotels, retailers, farms, and real estate agencies across Albania and Europe.

hospitality-assistant.title: Hotel Booking Bot
hospitality-assistant.description: WhatsApp bot for an Albanian hotel chain. Guests ask about rooms in Albanian, English, Italian, or German — the bot checks availability and books directly. Cut response time from hours to seconds.

ecommerce-assistant.title: Visual Product Search
ecommerce-assistant.description: Customer uploads a photo of a dress they like. The AI finds similar items in the store's catalog. Works on mobile, responds in under 2 seconds.

agri-traceability.title: Farm-to-Export Tracker
agri-traceability.description: Mobile app for Albanian food exporters. Scan a QR code to see where produce came from, how it was processed, and its EU compliance certificates. Required for exports to Germany and Italy.

document-processor.title: Invoice Processor
document-processor.description: Upload a stack of PDF invoices. The AI reads them — even handwritten Albanian ones — extracts the data, and exports to your accounting software. Saved 15+ hours per week for one client.

reputation-dashboard.title: Review Dashboard
reputation-dashboard.description: One screen showing reviews from Booking.com, Google, TripAdvisor. See sentiment trends. Get AI-suggested responses. Built for a hotel group managing 12 properties.

property-matcher.title: Property Matcher
property-matcher.description: Real estate site for international buyers. Describe what you want in plain English — 'sea view, under €200k, south Albania' — and the AI finds matching properties.
